name: High Protein Seafood Salad without Sauce
description: Dive into a refreshing and nutritious meal with our High Protein Seafood Salad. Perfect for those seeking a high-protein, low-carb, and low-sugar option, this salad combines flavorful seafood with crisp Ice Berg Lettuce and fiber-rich All-Bran for a deliciously healthified meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by boiling the egg. Place the egg in a saucepan, cover with water, and bring to a boil. Once boiling, lower the heat to a simmer and cook for 9 minutes for a hard-boiled egg. Remove from heat, cool in cold water, and then peel.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the tuna fillet from the can, ensuring to remove as much water as possible.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the crab sticks by slicing them into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the Ice Berg Lettuce thoroughly, then chop it into bite-sized pieces to form the salad base.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a large salad bowl, combine the boiled egg (sliced or chopped), crab stick pieces, drained tuna fillet, and Ice Berg Lettuce.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the All-Bran Regular over the salad for an added crunchy texture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
